<li>Is there anything we use to verify tools we install?</li>
</ul>
<p>yes, you can attempt to redownload a tool, or check its version.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">

sudo apt install python3
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>
